text: it seems to be working again now

text:
<@UH9MMLXAS>

From betfair:

I’ve found an explanation for this behaviour, why its intermittent and why it self corrects.  ERO & MGA relate to the underlying platform services used by the API:

“ANG does a join between MGA and ERO for the data required for listMarketCatalogue and the data that is missing here all comes from ERO.

The way it is coded, if ERO fails to return the response then just the data retrieved from MGA is returned - it looks like this is what is happening here”

elements.text:
From betfair:

I’ve found an explanation for this behaviour, why its intermittent and why it self corrects.  ERO & MGA relate to the underlying platform services used by the API:

“ANG does a join between MGA and ERO for the data required for listMarketCatalogue and the data that is missing here all comes from ERO.

The way it is coded, if ERO fails to return the response then just the data retrieved from MGA is returned - it looks like this is what is happening here”
